Notes: Building mapping with settlement data to determine urban/rural distribution

Notes: POI Mapping + Landcover mapping(water contamination source mapping)

Notes: POI Mapping (unpaid domestic and care work location mapping)

Notes: POI Mapping (managed drinking water source services)

6.5.1 Degree of integrated water resources management

Notes: Building mapping + Highway mapping(all-season road accessibility mapping)
